properties.entry: -- 通过房屋CODE查询房屋ID select h.id from main_house h where h.code = #houseCode# and h.isDeleted = 0
-- 通过车位CODE查询车位ID select h.id from main_carport h where h.code = #carportCode# and h.isDeleted = 0
-- 通过项目CODE查询项目ID select h.id from main_project h where h.code = #projectCode# and h.isDeleted = 0
